A4.text: Super Bowl 50 was the last playoff game played by the Broncos until the 2024â€“25 NFL playoffs, marking the longest playoff drought following a Super Bowl victory in NFL history.

A5.text: The Broncos became the fourth team to have eight Super Bowl appearances, then the NFL record. It was their second appearance in three years, having also reached Super Bowl XLVIII.
